title: James H. Shore, MD/Colorado ARCS Scholarship Endowment Fund
description: To provide support for a scholarship in accordance with the ARCS Foundation Scholarship in memory of James H. Shore at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide support for a scholarship in accordance with the ARCS Foundation Scholarship in memory of James H. Shore at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
